text: Mu mwaka ogw’omwenda ogwa Koseya, kabaka w’e Bwasuli n’awamba Samaliya, n’atwala Abayisirayiri mu buwaŋŋanguse17:6 Guno mulundi gwakubiri ng’Abayisirayiri mu bukiikakkono batwalibwa mu buwaŋŋanguse (laba 15:29) e Bwasuli, n’abateeka mu Kala, ne mu Kaboli ku mugga ogw’e Gozani, ne mu bibuga eby’Abameedi.
